Uses of IConnectionData in net.sf.rcer.conn.connections
 

Subinterfaces of IConnectionData in net.sf.rcer.conn.connections
 interface IConnection
          The actual data of a connection at runtime.
 

Classes in net.sf.rcer.conn.connections that implement IConnectionData
 class Connection
          The actual data of a connection at runtime.
 class ConnectionData
          This class encapsulates a set of connection data used to connect to a SAP R/3 system.
 class ProvidedConnectionData
          A wrapper for the connection data provided by a IConnectionProvider to ensure that the provider ID is supplied with the connection ID.
